name: Double the elements of the array, except for one
instruction:
The `twiceExceptOne` function takes an array of numbers and returns an array in which every number is multiplied by 2 except one.

Use the continue instruction to solve this problem.

The problem will be tested by applying the continue instruction.

```javascript
twiceExceptOne([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) // [1, 4, 6, 8, 10]
```
